text: The Breaks is a 1983 novel by Richard Price. The Breaks was Price's fourth novel. ==Overview== Peter Keller, a young liberal arts graduate, moves back into his father's apartment in Yonkers after failing to get into law school and quickly self-destructs. ==References== Category:1983 American novels Category:Novels by Richard Price (writer) Category:Novels set in New York (state) Category:Simon & Schuster books
title: The Breaks (novel)
